  \sum_{i=1}^{m}(x_i-avg(x))\cdot(y_i-avg(y))
}{
  \sqrt{
    \sum_{i=1}^{m}(x_i-avg(x))^2\cdot\sum_{i=1}^{m}(y_i-avg(y))^2
  }
}
